title: 高清补丁无法使用
author: 我戳
txt_content:
RT
双击打开后
出现
The registry refers to a nonexistent Java Runtime Environment installation or the runtime is corrupted.系统找不到指定路径。求解决

replies.author: Mei灬不是
replies.txt_content: 你没有java SDK,去下载一个吧

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: 准备全新的jar再打？别用改．ｍｉｎｅｃｒａｆｔ地址的启动器
